Delphi Epidata R API Client

Delphi Group

2023-07-07

Source: vignettes/epidatr.Rmd
epidatr.Rmd

Delphi Epidata R API Client 

# remotes::install_github("cmu-delphi/epidatr")
library("epidatr")
library("magrittr")
epicall <- covidcast("fb-survey", "smoothed_cli", "nation", "day", "us", epirange(20210405, 20210410))
epicall
## 
## ── <epidata_call> object: ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────
## • Pipe this object into `fetch()` to actually fetch the data
## • Request URL:
##   https://api.delphi.cmu.edu/epidata//covidcast/?data_source=fb-survey&signals=smoothed_cli&geo_type=nation&time_type=day&geo_values=us&time_values=20210405-20210410
epicall %>% fetch()
## # A tibble: 6 × 15
##   geo_value signal     source geo_type time_type time_value direction issue     
##   <chr>     <chr>      <chr>  <fct>    <fct>     <date>         <dbl> <date>    
## 1 us        smoothed_… fb-su… nation   day       2021-04-05        NA 2021-04-10
## 2 us        smoothed_… fb-su… nation   day       2021-04-06        NA 2021-04-11
## 3 us        smoothed_… fb-su… nation   day       2021-04-07        NA 2021-04-12
## 4 us        smoothed_… fb-su… nation   day       2021-04-08        NA 2021-04-13
## 5 us        smoothed_… fb-su… nation   day       2021-04-09        NA 2021-04-14
## 6 us        smoothed_… fb-su… nation   day       2021-04-10        NA 2021-04-15
## # ℹ 7 more variables: lag <int>, missing_value <int>, missing_stderr <int>,
## #   missing_sample_size <int>, value <dbl>, stderr <dbl>, sample_size <dbl>
